knimeNode.name: Document Data Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts data from a document into data columns

fullDescription.intro: Extracts information from a document into data columns. The node enhanced the input table by appending for each extractor a new data column that contains the desired information of the document in the same row.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the additional data columns.
